39208561.review:
Truly a Turning point for this series. 
While 5 of the 9 endings are pretty much re-skin-esk, the True, Conquest and Holy Sword all have drastic turning points that will make you understand why SOOOOO many people Love Nepgear. 
If you're returning from ReBirth1, It ain't easy adjusting to CPU candidates from the start. 
However it's clear that each candidate suit a very valuable role from tank, exe building, crowd control and healing. 
Once you figure it out, it boils down to you hunting "endings" which, as mentioned before, 3 are very much worth multiple play throughs to find out. 

IFfy is a little mean in this one, don't know what crawled up her butt and died :/
PS: I do know what and it's explained in the True Ending (o_o )b

39090418.review:
Bem, quando escrevo essa análise, tenho 69,5 horas de jogo. Ninguém vai gastar 70 horas com um jogo ruim. Eu podia parar aqui, mas tenho coisas a dizer.

Comprei o pacote completo. Virei a primeira vez com as DLC. Fica muito fácil. Assim, em vez de continuar com o game + após ter virado, decidi recomeçar do zero, sem as DLC de armas e equipamentos. Aí, é jogo sem apelação. Virei de novo e, agora, estou jogando o game + com o save sem as DLC, porque quero pegar todas as conquistas.

O jogo é um J-RPG clássico, mas tem um sistema de batalha que, ao menos para mim, é sensacional e novo. Cada personagem se movimenta independentemente durante a luta e, a depender da arma que porta, pode atingir vários adver´sarios ao mesmo tempo. O sistema marca todos os adversários que serão atingidos por determinado char, se ele atacar da posição em que está. E, se você quer tirar ou acrescentar algum adversário da mira, basta movimentar o char. É excelente.

O jogo não está traduzido, e isso pode dificultar para quem não lê inglês. Mas dá pra jogar, se não ligar para o enredo - o que não é incomum.

Não é apelativo, no sentido erótico. O nível de erotismo é sutil, na maioria das vezes, bem humorado, e há mais insinuações do que discursos ou imagens explícitas, a despeito da desagradável experiência de Ram e Rom nas mãos (ou será melhor: na língua) do CFW Trick...

Virar o jogo não significa zerar tudo que tem pra fazer. Os monstros que você mata durante a história principal não chegam aos pés, em termos de dificuldade, dos monstros das dungeons modificadas - esses, sim, são desafiadores.

São vários char, todos femininos (o que eu adoro), e você pode jogar com quem desejar, desde que Nepgear esteja na party. Há um sistema de golpes que só ativam quando determinados char estão na mesma party, e os mais poderosos exigem a presença das char que dispõe da possibilidade de mudar sua forma...

Divirtam-se.

O jogo vale MUITO a pena...

... se você gosta de J-RPG.

38963646.review:
Gameplay is the same as the first game in the series, but focuses on the CPU Candidates instead (i.e. the little sisters).
If you don't want the game to be a mind numbingly easy, then don't use the free sword DLC (or mask). They do help a lot for grinding later in the game though (if that's your thing).

The DLC in general is nothing too special, but you need the EXP Up if you want to do any of the coliseum battles at the end of the game.

The various endings in this game are pretty unique and was definitely not something I was originally expecting going in.

40710546.review:
Me costo mucho decidir en si darle manita arriba o abajo al juego... ¿Por que? Bueno, porque me senti incomodo con varios aspectos del juego que pasare a detallarlos a continuacion:

 - Arranca demasiado "debil", no entretiene desde el principio como lo supo hacer HN Re;Birth 1, y esto se debe a que Nepgear como protagonista no va muy bien... todo el tiempo me daba la sensacion de que no estaba a la altura de Neptune como protagonista y me inquietaba muchisimo su personalidad.

 - Si a eso le sumamos de que cada vez que entrabas a un mapa, o le rompias la guardia a un enemigo, sufrias bajones de FPS, entonces no alentaba mucho seguir jugando sabiendo que en este juego se grindea demasiado... el 80% de tu tiempo jugando vas a estar siendo molestado por esos bajones de FPS.

 - Subordinada y el ratoncito... algunos le llaman el "equipo rocket" jaja, y es que te la vas a encontrar todo el tiempo y vas a tener que pelear con ella muchisimas veces, se vuelve muy tedioso tener que pelear contra ella una y otra y otra vez en todos los mapas.

 - Red... por favor que personaje tan insoportable!!! la odie durante todo el juego, siempre se mete a tirar comentarios infumables y te la tenes que bancar nomas porque va a acompañarte durante todo el juego u.u

 - La curva de dificultad es otro gran problema en este juego, al principio cuesta muchisimo darle pelea a los enemigos porque les vas a hacer poco daño y ellos te hacen muchisimo daño tambien, te obliga a pasar un buen tiempo a farmeando exp para subir de nivel y no ser tan debil. Tenes el plano para debilitar a los enemigos ciertamente, pero en el 1 no tuve la necesidad de usarlo para disfrutar de un combate mas equilibrado, aunque bueno... en este tampoco tuve necesidad de usarlo porque el juego es tan generoso que te da una espada super OP para Nepgear que one shotea a todos los enemigos, una vez sentis su poder es inevitable seguir usando la espada, no vas a querer dejarla.

Todas esas cosas serian las que mayormente me molestaron muchisimo en el juego y me desmotivaba a seguir jugando. 

Pero luego del capitulo 3 la cosa se puso mas entretenida, para esta altura del juego ya tenia habilitado varios personajes que se acomodaban a mi modo de juego y me sentia mejor equipado como para no sentirme tan debil asi como me sentia al principio del juego. Ademas, las diosas volvian a estar presentes en el team y es curioso ver como es que con tan solo tener la presencia de ellas las escenas divertidas se incrementan muchisimo, sobre todo con Neptune.

Y algo muy positivo que tiene esta entrega es que al parecer tiene muchisimos finales, yo saque el normal, pero tiene como 9 o 10 y los finales cambian dependiendo de los shares que tenga cada ciudad y los shares de Arfoire. Me agrada porque tambien le dan una verdadera razon de existir a la mecanica de "shares", en el 1 no tenia mucho sentido pero en este si porque te cambia los finales y es necesario para desbloquear mas personajes jugables.

Asi que despues de todo termine contento con el juego y le doy mi manita arriba a pesar de las inquietudes que tuve con esta entrega.

40562537.review:
This game is an insult to everyone who spent money on this game. Oh you bought the game?Cool.Enjoy spending hours of listening to anti-piracy propaganda and how pirates are evil instead of, you know, an ACTUAL story for the people who ACTUALLY BOUGHT the game! The whole story revolves around making people who pirated it feel bad instead of entertaining the people who bought it. Well, it only made me wish I HAD pirated it! Then i wouldn't feel obligated to force myself play through this piece of $#!+.

The characters range from bland and uninteresting to downright annoying (with a few exceptions,mailnly the ones from the previous game). Also NO PLUTIA!. not even as DLC. Oh right! The DLC... It's basically cheats. You pay to skip the game. Sounds fun right? A cheatsword that obliterates everything and other stuff to basiclly make playing the game less of a grindfest because that's what it is, a freaking GRINDFEST. So in this case I am actually glad i was able to skip most of it.Player choice amirite? That's how you make a good game!(this is sarcasm fyi).

The translation is an atrocity. It tries too hard to be funny but fails miserably and is cringey af. Thankfully there is a mod that changes it to be much more tolerable.I highlly recommend it.

The gameplay is pretty much the same as Rebirth 1 which is not a bad thing if you enjoyed that but that just means it was just recycled along with almost all of the other assets from the previous game. Seriously, we are talking about A LOT of reused monsters and locations. No effort wahtsoever,just laziness.

Sorry for the length but this game made me so angry! I really enjoyed the first one and I hope the next one will be better but I cannot recommend this one.

P.S. If you thing that piracy is the "greatest evil" in the videogame industry you have been living under a rock.Sorry for the salt.

40240136.review:
You get what every HDN/MDN game gives ya. Third wall breaks, comedy, amazing story and plenty of secrets and quests. HDN RB2 makes a substantial upgrade from RB1 such as upgrading the battle system and bringing a lot of new characters. 

What I find interesting is how the plot between RB1 and RB2 is so similar to the plot between XCOM: Enemy Unknown and XCOM 2, where the enemy is beaten but they still come back and win, thus you must start from the bottom and work back up to the top.

As always with my reviews for the HDN/MDN series, I heavily stress the importance of better optimization for PC.

40131790.review:
Although i love Nepgear, i simply cannot recommend this game to anyone that is new to the Neptunia series or doesn't have the patience for excessive and tedious grinding. If you are new, please go and play Re;birth1 instead.

[h1]The Plot[/h1]

First of all, the plot is full of inconsistencies and most of it feels like it just happens, well, because why not? With some chapters being excessively long compared to others and some of them are only unlockeable by meeting some specific requirements. The story just takes itself too seriously in some moments where it should not and it longs just as half as Re;birth1's. It also doesn't have the comedy and the serious but funny parts that the first game had.

This game has many endings, but most of them are pure fillers that require a lot (seriously, a lot) of tedious grinding just for a little scene that comes after the credits. One of the endings is really interesting and unexpected for this kind of moe light-hearthed games, but it will have you grinding like hell, and, without a guide, forget about getting it.


The story of couse has it's good moments, but they don't really compensate it.

[h1]Characters[/h1]

The characters don't help either, with some of the secondaries being as interesting as a plank wood or some of them being really annoying, joining your party for no real reason at all. (Specially Red, i want to punch her in the face).

The CPU Candidates don't fit the protagonist role and can even become annoying in some parts (Ram is just a little brat and Uni acts tsundere for no reason at all). Don't misunderstand me, they are descent characters, but they simply don't work for protagonists. (Nepgear is not as bad as people say though, but Neptune is by far better than her in that role).

If we talk about the villains some of them are more interesting than the main characters, like CFW Brave, who i enjoyed a lot, or CFW Magic. I also enjoyed Underling and Warechu, but they just feel like a downgraded version of Team Rocket, you will be fighting them like 70% of the game. Although they are good characters, you know you have a problem when the villains draw more your attention than the main characters. Hell, i even found the oracles more interesting than them.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

My main problem with this game, if it weren't by it the past points would not really be a big deal.

The game has some ridiculous difficulty curves, and the grinding is basically a time-waster pain in the ass. You need to grind a lot in order to make the goddesses join your party, unlock the oracles and get the endings other than the normal one. It's simply ridiculously excessive, annoying and feels like a torture, specially the Lily Ranks, they will make you want to smash your skull against the wall multiple times.

Not to mention the Stella's Dungeon or the ridiculously OP sword Gehaburn-Anime and the hat Nepgeardam. They will make you one-hit everything, ruining the fun of using other characters than Nepgear. Once you feel their power you will simply can't stop using them. And still, the grinding will still be excessively huge.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Even though the enormous grinding, the story flaws and some boring characters, i liked the game. It made me laugh, made me sad and enternained me, and that's what entertainment in any of its forms should be about. (but not at the price of a terrible grinding system).

It's not a bad game, If you're a fan of Neptunia you should get it, preferably on a sale, but if you aren't, get the first game instead, it also has grinding, but it's a lot less and even actually funny. This game has more chances of pushing you away than attracting you.



Thanks for reading.

40060253.review: 听说有人换官中之后游戏有问题，不过我想应该跟重生1那会差不多，不能读档，我在这里分享下我解决方法，首先说明读档崩溃原因：其实是我们用汉化补丁存档的锅，解决方法把汉化补丁还原英文，然后用还原后的游戏（注意，先别改语言，以上步骤先别改语言，改了语音的请先换回英文语音或者日语     很重要很重要)，然后一个一个档替换就可以了（简单来说就是每个档都读取后马上存档），然后就可以在steam把语言改成官中了，以上我是个人解决方法，不一定全部都能这样解决，但不妨试一试

39972834.review:
Much like Re;Birth 1, this is a great game. However, if you buy it expecting it to be 100% similar to the previous installment, you're in for a bad time.

Nepgear is the protagonist. She is significantly more serious when compared to Neptune, and doesn't joke as much. The game has similar issues as Re;Birth 1 - notably the dungeons and music being constantly reused in other dungeons.

However, Re;Birth 2 does offer quite a few endings, giving it more replay value. And of course, Rom and Ram are adorable AF. So despite the flaws I will say that, despite being the least comedic game in the series, it's worth checking out overall. Just don't expect it to be as lighthearted and funny as Re;Birth1. Re;Birth2 is serious business.

39828725.review:
Ich würde dieses Spiel jedem Anime fan empfehlen der kawaii sachen und so mag :). Die story ist gut das Spielsystem (wenn wir ehlich sind) ziemlich beschissen. Man rennt immer nur in sehr kleinen dungeons von a nach b (kein open world). Die kämpfe sind auch keine besonderheit, eher einfacher oldschool rundenbasierter kampf. Allerdings sind die kampfeffekte richtig klasse. Aber man Spielt dieses Spiel eigentlich nur wegen der lustigen Dialogen (schade dass nur die hälfte davon gesprochen ist und die andere nur in textform existiert). 
Fazit: Man muss das Genre mögen um das spiel zu lieben. Deswegen ein Daumen hoch aber die Hersteller könnten das schon noch etwas ausreifen damit es auch für die breite masse etwas ist :)

39796440.review:
Despues de un año de jugar la primera entrega, decidi jugar su secuela y ahora lo termine puedo decir, que este juego es exactamente igual al juego anterior, pero con muchas LOLIS incluidas, en serio, nunca en mi vida vi tanta lolis en un videojuego, ademas de que este juego esta enfocado a un publico joven y adulto por el contenido que posee. Aun asi le hare su analisis en profundidad, ya que hay muchas cosas que comentar.

Puntos Positivos: este juego a pesar que es igual al anterior mejoras en algunos aspectos, entre ellos la jugabilidad, ya que ahora podemos controlar a 4 chicas en vez de a 3. La historia se enfoca ahora en las hermanas de las CPU, donde Nepgear es la protagonista principal junto con Uni, Ram y Rom. donde viviremos una gran aventura, con una historia muy entretenido y mas evento que no son importante en la historia, pero te sacaras una cacajadas y no puede falta el fanserve de lolis. Otro cosa que me gusto, que haya nuevas masmorras y que algunas de ellas son disitintas a otras, aunque hay algunas que se repitan, al menos en un pequeño gran paso para que el juego no sea repetitivo. Por ultimo lo que mas me gusto que tiene mucho contenido y tareas que podemos hacer, ademas de muchos personajes, algunas del juego anterior y otras nuevas en este juego.

Puntos Negativos: Algo que no me gusto para nada de este juego y que me cabreo demasiado, como dije, que este juego es exactamente como el primero, que no solo copio muchas cosas del juego, sino que tambien tiene LOS MISMOS ERRORES DE CRASHEO, haciendo que juego deje de funciona y debes de volver a empezar de nuevo, eso me molesto mucho, ya que cuando haces las tareas secundaria, sino guardas continuamente, el juego crachea y debes de empezar de nuevo, haciendo perder el tiempo invertidos. Tambien otro puento negativo es que hay algunas masmorras que se repiten en el juego y los enemigos siguen siendo los mismo, solo que con distinto nombre o color. Tambien que en el NG+ debes volver equipar a las chicas de 0, en vez de tener el equipamiento ya echo anteriormente, cosa que molesta, porque debes configurarlas de nuevo. Por ultimo pero no menos importantes son los DLC, que no solo incluye contenido que debes comprarlo por separado, ya que eso no me gusta para nada, sino que hay unos DLC de pago que incluye un arma para Nepgear muy rota, haciendola mas podedoras y gracias a eso, el juego se vuelve mas facil, viendose que este juego tenga uno mas DLC que influye en el juego, haciendo este juego single player en un PAY TO WIM en un juego de un solo jugador y que nisiquiera es un online competitivo, sino un JRPG en solitario.

Para finalizar, no es un mal juego, me encanto y me diverti mucho, pero no es perfecto, hay cosas que deben mejorar y espero que los siguientes juegos sean mas novedosos, sino sufriran el efecto AC. La nota que se lleva es un 7.5/10, recomendado y si no has jugado algun juego de la saga, empieza por el primero y despues juega este, aunque es una secuela indirecta, es recomendable empezar con el primer juego. Mis waifus de este juego son Nepgear, Uni y 5pb <3 <3 <3.

No se me olvida, quiero a agradecer a OSCAR73 y su gente por la traducion, sin ellos, este juego mucha gente ni lo compraria, ellos hacen lo que !f idea factory nunca ha echo por nosotros, traer un juego en español, muchas gracias, espero con ansias la traducion del tercer juego de la triologia y espero que se animen a hacer las  demas traduciones de la saga, sin ustedes, muchos de los que no saben ingles o tienen un nivel basico no podrian jugarlo.

39766498.review:
Well, once I got to the scene where 12 year old girls were literally being molested by a giant tongue from an old man I gave up on this series and this publisher/developer - and there'd already been several questionable moments before then in both games too. So yeah, pedophilia on steam. Lovely. What happened to JRPGs; what happened to anime? This is so sad, it really, really is.

Gameplay is fine - grindy traditional JRPG fare. You'll just need a strong stomach on the child molesting scenes, or, if you're into that, well... go to prison, then see if they'll allow you to play sometime.

39763467.review:
[h1][b]Análise[/b] Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2	[/h1]

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/31920725/] Análise promovida por ''Welcome to my life''[/url]

[h1]Resumo	[/h1]

[i]Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;birt2 Sister Generation é o segundo jogo da Série Neptunia sendo ele um remake do game pra ps3 chamado Hyperdimension Neptunia Mk2 e também sendo uma sequência não direta do primeiro jogo, Hyperdimension Neptunia re;birt1.[/i] ([strike]Essa primeira parte do resumo foi tirada dévido as minhas pesquisas em sites, então deixo créditos a eles.	[/strike])

[h1]Sobre o game + análise	[/h1]

[code][h1]DATA DE LANÇAMENTO[/h1]: 29/mai/2015
[h1]DESENVOLVEDOR[/h1] : Idea Factory ,Compile Heart ,Felistella
[h1]DISTRIBUIDORA[/h1] : Idea Factory, Idea Factory International[/code]

[b]Neptunia Re;Birth 2 se passa três anos após os eventos do primeiro jogo. Onde dessa vez encontramos as quatro 	[u]deusas[/u] Neptune, Noire, Vert e Blanc  na primeira parte do game elas foram derrotadas e aprisionadas no cemitério de Gamindustri. IF e Compa, parceiras de Neptune, tentam resgatá-las, mas conseguem apenas resgatar Nepgear,[i]irmã[/i] mais nova de Neptune.	[/b]

[b]Que agora será a [u]protagonista[/u] que iremos jogar, junto com Compa e IF você tem que passa diversos desafios e boss para resgatar as outras Deusas, enquanto prosseguindo você encontrará outros [i]NPC[/i] para você recrutar na sua ''Party'' (Seu time) que iremos encontrar em diversos continentes do game tal como  ''Planeptune'', assim para derrotar o boss final e liberta as outras Deusas.	[/b]

[h1]Gameplay + Conclusão	[/h1]

[b]As lutas são uma mistura de RPG e ação, onde tem o campo de batalha e limites até onde você pode chegar, assim que chegar no inimigo vc tem diversas [i]skills[/i] para escolher usar ou apenas se defende, também precisa se ligar no tanto de energia tal sua como a do seu inimigo que isso irá concluir a batalha.	[/b]

[b]Agora os[u] gráficos[/u], eu realmente achei ''básico'' mas isso não quer dizer nada achei básico no jeito do mapa entre outras poucas coisas, mas isso não muda muito poís o game é realmente lindo.	[/b]

[b][h1]Importante lembra[/h1]O game é considerado bem difícil então tem que saber jogar, além do que alguns combates chega até ser repetitivo ( igual alguns de vcs na escola). 	[/b]
	
[h1]Então é isso acho que já falei todos os pontos do jogo para você decidir compra-lo ou não!	[/h1]

 [b]Aqui está um Guia de conquista caso queira platinar o game! [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1280532491]Platine o game[/url] [/b]

39757147.review:
久闻魔剑大名，故任一事件不敢遗漏。
虽一周目得NE，爆肝之后，便出TE。
我是从后往前玩的，还是不太适应老系统
满满的年代感充斥着游戏体验，不过剧情还是很有意思的(魔剑线打算最后走)
全成就看起来得花蛮长的时间(摸一摸稀疏的头发)
总的来说还是很不错的

39738397.review:
以下为个人魔剑结局通关感想，严重涉及剧透......


[spoiler]通关了魔剑结局......

对于这一结局，从理性角度去想，如果稍结合魔改的动画剧情分析——マジェコンヌ(烧录卡/玛杰空努)追求的是不需要女神的新秩序，最终目的是消灭女神们，然后让世界能平等地由拥有强大力量的人支配，可以是她，也可以是比她更强大的人——无限接近于专制或寡头政体。而在那把剑逐一染上战败的女神们的鲜血，独剩一位孤独的女神时，似乎也在强烈暗示着犯罪神的愿望已由另一个人完成......

然后，于感性的角度——这过于沉重了，对一个人，对于仅存的一个人，不，哪怕是女神来说，这也过于沉重了——在目睹最后这趟诛心之旅时我一直在重复着类似的话......


这还怎么让我和别人安利说，这是一个“带有玩梗性质和百合要素、纯萌豚向的日式RPG”啊(苦笑)。[/spoiler]

39709073.review: I was a tad bit confused when I first played through this in regards to the story. I get that it's a sequel, but it doesn't appear to be a direct sequel, so transitioning to this from the first game expecting it to follow that storyline was... probably a mistake on my part. Still, regardless, the game is just as fun to play as the first one was (at least for the remakes, I have not played the original playstation versions, as I didn't, nor do I currently own a PS3), and would highly recommend it. Might not be as easy as Nep Re;Birth 1 was, it's still nice to see a bit of a challenge here and there.

39660146.review: Foi um bom jogo mas acho q poderia ser melhor

39631695.review:
哇，总算靠各种办法刷完多结局的成就了···
第二部大致讲的是妮普吉雅与后补女神们一起拯救回4女神，最后打败大BOSS过上没羞没臊的生活的故事(滑稽←_←)
玩的时候感觉对话没第一部那么搞笑风趣，反而是偏正经的拯救故事，大概是妮普吉雅没有姐姐妮普禔努那么无厘头吧~(是个乖妹妹呢~~~)
一周目我正常玩到普通结局，期间也有搜集or打怪练级，大概10小时左右(？)就结束了。第二章剧情长得我以为没有第三章了···
另外，由于不同结局与信仰度+对应人物百合度挂钩，信仰可以刷竞技场，但百合度连修改器也不能修改，于是剩下20小时基本都在刷这刷那。我在一周目存档基础上把所有人的百合度刷到5-6级，看完所有普通结局后，再看圣剑结局要求，一口老血吐出来，刷不起，刷不起，只好找圣剑存档看剧情了···当然，true结局也是能一周目就打出来的，但等我快打最终boss时，我发现怎么还是少一些迷宫导致小游戏通关成就无法完成，估计是要二周目才能完成？？？竞技场隐藏boss也是要二周目才能完成，尴，不想从打一遍啊···
——————————————————————————————
使用DOGOO404小组的汉化补丁：
1.长时间玩会出现部分画面黑屏/缺失，是因为占用内存过高加载缺失(超过2.8G?)，游戏没做内存释放的优化，例如重复刷同一个竞技场关卡会不断新增内存至黑屏，建议保存重开(不知道是不是汉化补丁的锅？第一部官方繁中内存倒是稳定在3G以下)；
2.企划书部分和1不太一样，迷宫变化(地下城变化)和道具变化/强敌追加不能共存，迷宫变化(地下城变化)是怪物改变了；
3.部分迷宫属于隐藏迷宫，需要从隐藏宝箱里找到开发计划书开发，例如涅涅岛(我们走岛屿?)，在世界迷宫第二层找；
4.隐藏宝箱是随机的，很坑！需要多刷，而且正常退出迷宫再进并不会刷出来，最快的方法是用道具退出再进！！！
5.内置挂机小游戏可以刷到很多有用的素材，但是等待时间是“现实时间”，建议修改系统时间直接完成，小游戏按Esc或者Tab键开始；
6.游戏多个结局与百合度挂钩···刷死人了，建议装提升百合度的红色援助的光盘，然后竞技场重复刷；
7.攻略的普通结局里，厂商结局和四国结局的成就并不能一起出来的，是分开计算的；
8.竞技场隐藏Boss：Delphinus的中文名字，这汉化补丁里叫戴菲努斯
9.2018.01.26发现繁中版本，应该还不能用吧？

39621522.review: ด้วยความที่คิดว่า RE;Birth2 เนื้อเรื่องจะต่อจากภาคแรกไปเอง เลยทำให้ผิดหวังนิดหน่อย แต่ให้อภัยเพราะเกียร์น่ารัก มีความรู้สึกว่าภาคนี้เล่นยากกว่าภาคแรกเยอะเลย แต่ดีที่เกียร์จังมีดาบเทพ ภาคนี้เนปโกะไม่ค่อยฮา
